mapper.insert: insert into attach (atch_no, atch_parent_no, atch_category, atch_file_name, atch_original_name, atch_file_size, atch_fancy_size, atch_content_type, atch_path, atch_down_hit, atch_reg_date) values (default, #{atch_parent_no}, #{atch_category}, #{atch_file_name}, #{atch_original_name}, #{atch_file_size}, #{atch_fancy_size}, #{atch_content_type}, #{atch_path}, 0, default)
